subject: Payment Failure
draft_response: Advise customer to try another card or contact their bank

subject: Login Issue
description: User can't log in despite correct credentials
draft_response: Clear browser cache and try again

subject: Data Sync Error
description: User data not updating across devices
draft_response: Inform that sync will complete in next 10 minutes

subject: App Crash
draft_response: Recommend app reinstallation or OS upgrade

subject: Feature Request
description: Customer requesting a new reporting tool

subject: Wrong Invoice
draft_response: Send corrected invoice and update records
